entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
